AppDescription: This application is an easy-to-use and user-friendly project management software that will help you significantly increase the efficiency of your team at work
SimpleInterfaceInfo: Register in a couple of clicks and try all the features of the application
AbsolutelyFreeInfo: All features of the application are available without payment
DualLanguageInfo: Use the functionality of the application by choosing a language convenient for you
ManageProjectsInfo: Use different workspaces for personal tasks and team projects. Delegate management to colleagues
AboutCourse: The application was developed as part of the
FreeCourse: Free course from The Rolling Scopes community
EveryoneCan: Everyone can study at RS School, regardless of age, professional employment and place of residence. However, for successful learning it is necessary to have a solid  knowledge of HTML, CSS and Javascript.
PayItForward: The principle of «Pay it forward» works at RS School. Teachers share their knowledge with students for free now, hoping that in the future they will return as mentors and pass on their knowledge to the next generation of students in the same way.
